Package it.polimi.ingsw.clients.viewer.controllers

Class ResizeHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.clients.viewer.controllers.ResizeHandler
public class ResizeHandler extends Object
Class ResizeHandler is a class that is used by the Graphical User Interface. This class is the one that handles the Window resizing since the scenes do not have a fixed size.
